response.overview: Phillip is a wealthy quadriplegic who needs a caretaker to help him with his day-to-day routine in his New York penthouse. He decides to hire Dell, a struggling parolee who's trying to reconnect with his ex and his young son. Despite coming from two different worlds, an unlikely friendship starts to blossom.
response.title: The Upside

crew.name: Shea Sinclair
crew.job: Executive In Charge Of Post Production

results.name: Kevin Hart And Nicole Kidman Don't Get Along - Extended Preview
